prompts.title: Landing Page Copy Framework
prompts.content:
Write landing page copy for [PRODUCT/SERVICE]. Include:
- Headline and subheadline
- Value proposition
- 3 key benefits
- Social proof section
- FAQ (3-5 questions)
- CTA buttons text
- Trust indicators
Target audience: [DEMOGRAPHIC]

prompts.title: Social Media Content Calendar
prompts.content:
Create a 1-week content calendar for [BRAND] on [PLATFORMS]. Include:
- Daily post themes
- Content types (video, image, text)
- Captions (50-100 words each)
- Hashtag strategies
- Best posting times
- Engagement tactics
Brand voice: [DESCRIPTION]

prompts.title: Customer Persona Developer
prompts.content:
Create a detailed customer persona for [PRODUCT/SERVICE]. Include:
- Demographics
- Psychographics
- Pain points (3-5)
- Goals and motivations
- Buying behavior
- Preferred channels
- Objections to address
- Messaging that resonates

prompts.title: A/B Test Hypothesis Generator
prompts.content:
Generate 5 A/B test ideas for [WEBSITE/APP ELEMENT]. For each test:
- Hypothesis statement
- Control vs. variant description
- Success metrics
- Expected impact
- Implementation complexity
- Test duration recommendation

prompts.title: Brand Voice Guidelines
prompts.content:
Develop brand voice guidelines for [COMPANY]. Include:
- Voice attributes (3-5)
- Tone variations by channel
- Do's and don'ts
- Example phrases
- Words to use/avoid
- Writing samples
Brand personality: [DESCRIPTION]
